item.title: No Urea Shortage in Jogulamba Gadwal District: District Collector
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: District Collector B.M. Santosh has clarified that there is no shortage of urea in Jogulamba Gadwal district and that reports suggesting otherwise are baseless.
In an official press statement issued on Tuesday, the Collector stated that news published in some sections of the media claiming that farmers were facing difficulties and standing in long queues due to a shortage of urea was not true. He assured farmers that sufficient quantities of urea are available in the district to meet cu...]]>
item.author: The Hans India, Andhra Pradesh
